messages.content: You are an expert in language translation, especially between English and Lithunian. Reply with the only translated text, with no other information.
Translate the following Lithunian text into English: ES pasiruošusi stiprinti bendradarbiavimą su vyriausybėmis, kad būtų kovojama su netolerancija ir ginamos žmogaus teisės.
The EU stands ready to enhance its cooperation with governments in order to combat intolerance and protect human rights.
You are an expert in language translation, especially between English and Lithunian. Reply with the only translated text, with no other information.
Translate the following Lithunian text into English: Priešingai, opozicijai nesuteikus atstovavimo teisės, parlamente didėja socialinįtampa.
On the contrary, denying the opposition the right to representation in parliament results in deepening social tensions.
You are an expert in language translation, especially between English and Lithunian. Reply with the only translated text, with no other information.
Translate the following Lithunian text into English: Antra, dėl transporto: Komisija rengia baltąją knygą dėl transporto ateities ir ji turėtų būti priimta 2011 m. kovo mėn.
Secondly, on transport, the Commission is preparing a White Paper on the future of transport, which is due to be adopted in March 2011.
You are an expert in language translation, especially between English and Lithunian. Reply with the only translated text, with no other information.
Translate the following Lithunian text into English: Kaip matyti iš pavėluotos Europos Sąjungos reakcijos į padėtį Tunise, Europos Sąjunga remia niekingą imperializmą.
The Union represents cowardly imperialism, as evidenced by its belated response to the situation in Tunisia.
You are an expert in language translation, especially between English and Lithunian. Reply with the only translated text, with no other information.

Translate the following Lithunian text into English: Ji pažeidžiama socialiniu požiūriu, nes dešimtmečius socialinės struktūros nebuvo plėtojamos taip, kad suteiktų galimybę didesniems visuomenės sluoksniams dalyvauti ekonominėje plėtroje.
It is socially fragile because social structures have failed to develop over the decades in such a way as to enable large sections of society to share in economic development.
You are an expert in language translation, especially between English and Lithunian. Reply with the only translated text, with no other information.

Translate the following Lithunian text into English: Jam iš tiesų prastai pasirengta bendros vizijos, kuri mums reikalinga, atžvilgiu, taip pat prastai pasirengta mūsų naudojamų išteklių ir priemonių suderinamumo klausimais.
It has actually been poorly prepared in terms of the common vision that we need and it has also been poorly prepared in terms of the coherence of the resources and instruments that we use.
You are an expert in language translation, especially between English and Lithunian. Reply with the only translated text, with no other information.
Translate the following Lithunian text into English: Pritariu jums, kad turime būti aktyvesni ir nuveikti daugiau, ir visiškai pritariu nuomonei, kad turime persvarstyti kaimynystės politiką.
I agree with you that we need to be more active on the ground to do more and I absolutely agree that we need to revisit the neighbourhood policy.
You are an expert in language translation, especially between English and Lithunian. Reply with the only translated text, with no other information.

Translate the following Lithunian text into English: - (SK) Ponia pirmininke, tuberkuliozė, kaip ir maliarija bei AIDS, yra viena didžiausių epidemijų, naikinančių besivystančių šalių gyventojus, pirmiausia Afrikoje ir Azijoje.
- (SK) Madam President, tuberculosis, like malaria and AIDS, is one of the great pandemics which are decimating the populations of developing countries, particularly in Africa and Asia.
You are an expert in language translation, especially between English and Lithunian. Reply with the only translated text, with no other information.
Translate the following Lithunian text into English: Ir elektroninių prekių gamintojai, ir vartotojai turi prisiimti atsakomybę siekiant šio tikslo.
Both electronic goods manufacturers and consumers need to assume their responsibilities in order to meet this target.
You are an expert in language translation, especially between English and Lithunian. Reply with the only translated text, with no other information.
Translate the following Lithunian text into English: Elektros ir elektronikos įrangos atliekų išskiriamos pavojingos medžiagos gali kelti didelį pavojų sveikatai ir aplinkai.
The hazardous substances often produced by waste from electrical and electronic equipment can cause huge health and environment risks.
You are an expert in language translation, especially between English and Lithunian. Reply with the only translated text, with no other information.

Translate the following Lithunian text into English: Pritariu nuomonei, kad reikia griežtai reikalauti iš valstybių narių sparčiau įtraukti šios direktyvos nuostatas į nacionalinės teisės aktus ir tai padaryti visapusiškai.
I agree with the view that there is a need to put effective pressure on Member States to speed up the incorporation of the directive into national law, and to complete this fully.
You are an expert in language translation, especially between English and Lithunian. Reply with the only translated text, with no other information.
Translate the following Lithunian text into English: Remti MVĮ svarbu, nes šios įmonės svarbios dabartinei ir ateities Europai.
Support for SMEs is important because these firms are important for the present and future of Europe.
You are an expert in language translation, especially between English and Lithunian. Reply with the only translated text, with no other information.
Translate the following Lithunian text into English: raštu. - Su Taryba pasiektas susitarimas yra įtemptų derybų susiduriant su intensyviu pramonės lobizmu rezultatas.
in writing. - The agreement which has been reached with Council is the result of tough negotiations in the face of intense lobbying from industry.
You are an expert in language translation, especially between English and Lithunian. Reply with the only translated text, with no other information.

Translate the following Lithunian text into English: raštu. - Balsavau už šį susitarimą, nes jis padės gerinti Europos prekybos ir bendradarbiavimo ryšius su Pietų Afrika, kurie yra labai svarbūs Pietų Afrikos regionui, taip pat mums.
in writing. - I voted in favour of this agreement as it will improve Europe's trade and development relations with South Africa, which are critical for the South African region and also for us.
You are an expert in language translation, especially between English and Lithunian. Reply with the only translated text, with no other information.
Translate the following Lithunian text into English: Reglamente nustatytos miesto ir tolimojo susisiekimo autobusų keleivių teisės, atitinkančios kitų transporto rūšių keleivių teises.
It establishes rights for passengers using bus and coach transport, which are comparable to those that apply to all other modes of transport.
You are an expert in language translation, especially between English and Lithunian. Reply with the only translated text, with no other information.
Translate the following Lithunian text into English: Tai geriausias būdas drauge puoselėti žmogaus teises, kaip vieną svarbiausių laisvės, saugumo ir teisingumo erdvės ramsčių.
That is the best way to jointly uphold human rights as one of the important pillars of the area of freedom, justice and security.
You are an expert in language translation, especially between English and Lithunian. Reply with the only translated text, with no other information.
Translate the following Lithunian text into English: Kodėl dabartinVengrijos konservatorių vyriausybtaip pat ardo neveiksmingą antrąją pensinio aprūpinimo pakopą?
Why is the current conservative government in Hungary also dismantling the ineffective second pillar of pension provision?
You are an expert in language translation, especially between English and Lithunian. Reply with the only translated text, with no other information.
Translate the following Lithunian text into English: Šiose diskusijose puolama priemonyra teisėta teisinpriemonė, kuri gali būti naudojama kovojant su nusikalstamumu.
The measure which is being attacked in this debate is a legitimate legal instrument which can be used in the fight against crime.
You are an expert in language translation, especially between English and Lithunian. Reply with the only translated text, with no other information.
Translate the following Lithunian text into English: Vertinant dar plačiau, Ekonomikos ir pinigų politikos komitetas pabrėžia, kad ekonomikos valdysena turi būti grindžiama Bendrijos metodu.
More broadly, the Committee on Economic and Monetary Affairs emphasises that economic governance must be based on the Community method.
You are an expert in language translation, especially between English and Lithunian. Reply with the only translated text, with no other information.

Translate the following Lithunian text into English: Vaistų falsifikavimas ir kiekiai, patenkantys į legalią tiekimo grandinę, yra nerimą keliantys klausimai, kuriuos reikia tinkamai spręsti ir su kuriais reikia kovoti.
The falsification of medicinal products and the alarming quantities entering the legal supply chain are worrying issues that need to be duly addressed and combated.
You are an expert in language translation, especially between English and Lithunian. Reply with the only translated text, with no other information.
Translate the following Lithunian text into English: Be to, reikėtų atsižvelgti į tai, kad Kroatijos narystpaskatintų likusias Balkanų šalis sparčiau artėti link narystės ES.
Furthermore, it should be taken into account that the accession of Croatia would also encourage the rest of the countries of the Western Balkans to move towards EU Membership more quickly.
You are an expert in language translation, especially between English and Lithunian. Reply with the only translated text, with no other information.

Translate the following Lithunian text into English: Jei galėtume tai padaryti, nereikėtų baimintis, kad Egiptas pasuks Irano keliu, priešingai - galėtume būti tikri, kad Iranas ims sekti Egipto pavyzdžiu.
If this can be done, we will not have to fear that Egypt will take the path of Iran but, on the contrary, we can be sure that Iran will take the path of Egypt.
You are an expert in language translation, especially between English and Lithunian. Reply with the only translated text, with no other information.
Translate the following Lithunian text into English: Jis bendradarbiavo su Europos investicijų banku (EIB) ir šešėliniais pranešėjais iš penkių skirtingų Parlamento komitetų.
He worked together with both the European Investment Bank (EIB) and the shadow rapporteurs from the five different committees in Parliament that were involved.
You are an expert in language translation, especially between English and Lithunian. Reply with the only translated text, with no other information.
Translate the following Lithunian text into English: Tačiau negalėjau negalvoti apie Iraną, kuris nuvertus korumpuotą ir autokratinį šacho režimą tapo represine Irano Islamo Respublika.
However, I could not help thinking of Iran, where the overthrow of the corrupt, autocratic regime of the Shah led to the formation of a repressive Islamic Republic.
You are an expert in language translation, especially between English and Lithunian. Reply with the only translated text, with no other information.
Translate the following Lithunian text into English: Pone pirmininke, 1991 m. Jemene uždrausta vykdyti mirties bausmę jaunesniems nei 15 metų asmenims.
Mr President, the use of capital punishment on juveniles under the age of 15 was prohibited in Yemen in 1991.
You are an expert in language translation, especially between English and Lithunian. Reply with the only translated text, with no other information.
Translate the following Lithunian text into English: Šios naujos specialios sąskaitos atidarymas prisidės prie to, kad būtų užtikrinta, jog skirtos lėšos būtų tiesiogiai panaudotos sektoriui paremti.
The establishment of this new special account will contribute towards guaranteeing that the funds allocated go directly to the sectoral support.
You are an expert in language translation, especially between English and Lithunian. Reply with the only translated text, with no other information.
Translate the following Lithunian text into English: Galiausiai ateityje, siekdami atsargaus ir atsakingo valdymo naudojant dirvožemį, į sėjomainos ciklą turime įtraukti baltymingus augalus.
Lastly, in future, we need to incorporate protein crops into the crop rotation cycle as part of our prudent and responsible soil use management.
You are an expert in language translation, especially between English and Lithunian. Reply with the only translated text, with no other information.

Translate the following Lithunian text into English: Mums reikia privalomų teisės aktuose įtvirtintų taisyklių, ir mes siekiame galutinio pripažinimo, kad moterų darbu labai prisidedama prie mūsų gerovės kūrimo.
We want binding statutory regulations and we want final recognition that the work of women makes a decisive contribution to our prosperity.
You are an expert in language translation, especially between English and Lithunian. Reply with the only translated text, with no other information.

Translate the following Lithunian text into English: Dėl 2010 m. Lisabonos sutartyje reikalaujamų konstitucinių reformų poreikio valdančiosios Austrijos partijos pradėjo standartizuotą skyrimo į kai kurias ES pareigas procedūrą.
As a result of the constitutional reforms necessitated by the Treaty of Lisbon in 2010, the ruling parties in Austria introduced a kind of standardised nomination procedure for some EU posts.
You are an expert in language translation, especially between English and Lithunian. Reply with the only translated text, with no other information.

Translate the following Lithunian text into English: Visų pirma norėjau palaikyti Europos Parlamento siekį tvirtai pabrėžti pavojus, kuriuos Europos Komisijos prekybos strategija kelia Europos Sąjungos žemės ūkiui.
In particular, I wanted to support the desire of the European Parliament to emphasise strongly the dangers that the European Commission's trade strategy presents to agriculture in the European Union.
You are an expert in language translation, especially between English and Lithunian. Reply with the only translated text, with no other information.

Translate the following Lithunian text into English: Moterims reikėtų užtikrinti vienodas pensijas, todėl pritariau pasiūlymui užtikrinti moterims tokias pat teises pensijų ir socialinės apsaugos atveju. Apytikriai 17 proc.
Equal pensions for women should be guaranteed, and it is for this reason I supported the proposal to ensure the same rights for women in the case of pensions and social security.
You are an expert in language translation, especially between English and Lithunian. Reply with the only translated text, with no other information.

Translate the following Lithunian text into English: Visų pirma pabrėžiu korupcijos ir organizuoto nusikalstamumo klausimus, kurių atžvilgiu yra nustatyti aiškūs ir tinkamai apibrėžti kriterijai pažangai įvertinti.
I particularly emphasise the issue of corruption and organised crime, on which there are clear and well-defined benchmarks for measuring progress.
You are an expert in language translation, especially between English and Lithunian. Reply with the only translated text, with no other information.

Translate the following Lithunian text into English: Žinoma, svarbu atidžiai vertinti pramonės gamybos poveikį aplinkai, bet neturime netiesiogiai apsunkinti pramonės pernelyg dideliais reikalavimais.
It is certainly important to assess the impact of industrial output on the environment in a stringent manner, but we must not indirectly burden industry with regulations that are almost overstated.
You are an expert in language translation, especially between English and Lithunian. Reply with the only translated text, with no other information.
Translate the following Lithunian text into English: Šiuo metu šis sąrašas pildomas įtraukiant į jį keletą asmenų iš M. Gaddafi ir jo artimiausių bendrininkų kontroliuojamų organizacijų.
We are now in the process of adding several entities controlled by Gaddafi and his closest associates to that list.
You are an expert in language translation, especially between English and Lithunian. Reply with the only translated text, with no other information.
Translate the following Lithunian text into English: Svarbu, kad Europa nebūtų susiskaidžiusi ir konkurencingumo požiūriu.
It is important that Europe should not be torn apart from the point of view of competitiveness either.
You are an expert in language translation, especially between English and Lithunian. Reply with the only translated text, with no other information.

Translate the following Lithunian text into English: Nuolat kyla įtampa, kurią ne visada lengva suderinti, žmogaus teisių paisymo ir kitų nacionalinių interesų (galbūt karinių arba ekonominių) derinimo srityje.
There is constantly a tension that is not always easily reconcilable between respect for human rights and other national interests (perhaps of a military or economic nature).
You are an expert in language translation, especially between English and Lithunian. Reply with the only translated text, with no other information.
Translate the following Lithunian text into English: Kartu turime užtikrinti, kad ES atliktų esminį vaidmenį jiems pereinant iš persekiojamos opozicijos į demokratinę vyriausybę.
Together, we need to ensure that the EU plays a key role in their transition from persecuted opposition to a democratic government.
You are an expert in language translation, especially between English and Lithunian. Reply with the only translated text, with no other information.
Translate the following Lithunian text into English: Kaip Komisija įtraukšias sritis į ketinamą parengti priemonių sąrašą ar kaip, jos manymu, ji ketina tai padaryti?
How has the Commission included, or how is it thinking of including, these areas in the list of measures to be drawn up?
You are an expert in language translation, especially between English and Lithunian. Reply with the only translated text, with no other information.

Translate the following Lithunian text into English: Tačiau tai negali būti primesta iš išorės ar netgi karinėmis priemonėmis, tai turi būti taikus ir demokratinis procesas, todėl balsuojant pritariau šiam pranešimui.
However, this cannot be achieved from the outside or even by military means; it must be a peaceful and democratic process, which is why I support this proposal with my vote.
You are an expert in language translation, especially between English and Lithunian. Reply with the only translated text, with no other information.
Translate the following Lithunian text into English: Vengrijos užsienio reikalų ministras J. Martonyi ir C. Malmström šiuo metu lankosi Egipte ir prie jo bendros sienos su Libija.
The Hungarian Minister for Foreign Affairs, János Martonyi, and Commissioner Malmström are currently visiting Egypt and its common border with Libya.
You are an expert in language translation, especially between English and Lithunian. Reply with the only translated text, with no other information.

Translate the following Lithunian text into English: Planavimas, statyba, eksploatavimas, išmontavimas ir (kaip dabar Fukušimos branduolinėje elektrinėje) avarinių padėčių sprendimas yra žmogaus žinių ir atsidavimo išbandymas.
Planning, construction, operation, dismantling and, like now in the Fukushima power plant, handling accidents are a trial of strength of human knowledge and dedication.
You are an expert in language translation, especially between English and Lithunian. Reply with the only translated text, with no other information.
Translate the following Lithunian text into English: Todėl turime būti atsargūs ir pernelyg griežtais teisės aktais neapsunkinti jų padėties.
We must therefore be cautious not to complicate their situation through legislation that is too strict.
You are an expert in language translation, especially between English and Lithunian. Reply with the only translated text, with no other information.

Translate the following Lithunian text into English: Kaip minėta Europos Komisijos Pirmininko laiške ir kaip aiškiai pareiškpranešėja F. Balzani, privalome užtikrinti pakankamą išlaidų finansavimą remdamiesi 2020 m. strategija.
As mentioned in the letter from the President of the Commission, and as the rapporteur, Ms Balzani clearly stated, we must ensure sufficient funding for expenditure under the 2020 Strategy.
You are an expert in language translation, especially between English and Lithunian. Reply with the only translated text, with no other information.
Translate the following Lithunian text into English: Prognozuojama, kad dėl mažesnių skrydžių kainų būtų galima sutaupyti iki 72 mln. EUR ir vartotojai tuo galėtų pasinaudoti tiesiogiai.
According to predictions, the potential savings as a result of cheaper flight prices amount to EUR 72 million, which would benefit consumers directly.
You are an expert in language translation, especially between English and Lithunian. Reply with the only translated text, with no other information.

Translate the following Lithunian text into English: Tinklų ir informacijos apsauga kelia vis didesnį rūpestį ne tik priimantiems politinius sprendimus, bet ir visiems tiems, kurie vis labiau jais naudojasi bendraudami tarpusavyje ir su valstybių institucijomis.
Network and information security is a growing concern not only for political decision makers, but for all those who increasingly use it to interact with each other and with the state authorities.
You are an expert in language translation, especially between English and Lithunian. Reply with the only translated text, with no other information.

Translate the following Lithunian text into English: Todėl pirmiausia pristatome teisinių priemonių dėl nusikaltimo aukų teisių, apsaugos bei paramos joms ir abipusio apsaugos priemonių pripažinimo paketą.
We are thus presenting, as a first step, a package of legislative measures on the rights, protection and support of victims of crime and the mutual recognition of protection measures.
You are an expert in language translation, especially between English and Lithunian. Reply with the only translated text, with no other information.

Translate the following Lithunian text into English: Kol Prancūzija, Vokietija ir Austrija nepriims visų atvykstančiųjų iš Šiaurės Afrikos per jų teritoriją, Italija negali priimti Libijos, Tuniso ir Egipto gyventojų.
Italy can no longer accept Libyans, Tunisians and Egyptians until France, Germany and Austria cease rejecting anyone who comes from North Africa through their territory.
You are an expert in language translation, especially between English and Lithunian. Reply with the only translated text, with no other information.
Translate the following Lithunian text into English: Šimtai žmonių buvo nužudyti Lokerbyje, įskaitant daugybę europiečių, ir štai matome Europos vadovus susitinkant su šiuo žudiku.
Hundreds of people were killed in Lockerbie, many of them Europeans and then we see European leaders meeting with this murderer.
You are an expert in language translation, especially between English and Lithunian. Reply with the only translated text, with no other information.
Translate the following Lithunian text into English: Kita vertus, Europos žmonės, kurie turėtų būti jūsų pagrindinis prioritetas, turi absoliučią teisę pasakyti "NE" ir teisę būti išklausyti.
The European peoples on the other hand, who should be your first priority, do have the absolute right to say 'STOP' and to be heard.
You are an expert in language translation, especially between English and Lithunian. Reply with the only translated text, with no other information.
Translate the following Lithunian text into English: Vis dėlto siekiant išvengti problemų ateityje, svarbu atidžiai stebėti eksporto kreditų agentūrų veiklą.
However, it is important that ECAs' activities be closely supervised, so as to prevent future problems.
You are an expert in language translation, especially between English and Lithunian. Reply with the only translated text, with no other information.
Translate the following Lithunian text into English: Vis dėlto tą reikia daryti vadovaujantis skaidrumo principu, prisiimant visą atsakomybę už sąnaudas ir prisiimant tikrą atsakomybę už veiklą.
However, it must be done according to transparent principles, with complete responsibility for the costs and taking genuine responsibility for the activity.
You are an expert in language translation, especially between English and Lithunian. Reply with the only translated text, with no other information.

Translate the following Lithunian text into English: Skaidri ir saugi Europos politinių partijų veiklos ir finansavimo aplinka ES valstybių narių piliečiams taip pat yra pageidautinas ir palankiai vertintinas žingsnis.
A transparent and secure environment for the operation and funding of European political parties is also a desirable and welcome step for the citizens of EU Member States.
You are an expert in language translation, especially between English and Lithunian. Reply with the only translated text, with no other information.

Translate the following Lithunian text into English: Vis dėlto manome, kad Komisija tebesilaiko filosofijos, atitinkančios Lisabonos strategiją, kurios tikslų, remiantis oficialia Komisijos pozicija, nepavyko pasiekti.
However, we are of the opinion that the Commission is sticking to the philosophy behind the Lisbon strategy which, according to the Commission's official position, failed to meet its targets.
You are an expert in language translation, especially between English and Lithunian. Reply with the only translated text, with no other information.
Translate the following Lithunian text into English: raštu. - Palaikau šį Komisijos pasiūlymą dėl Europos Parlamento ir Tarybos sprendimo mobilizuoti ES solidarumo fondo lėšas.
in writing. - I support this Commission proposal for a decision of the European Parliament and of the Council on the mobilisation of the EU Solidarity Fund.
You are an expert in language translation, especially between English and Lithunian. Reply with the only translated text, with no other information.
Translate the following Lithunian text into English: Vis dėlto manau, jog šiuo metu ES būdingomis taupymo sąlygomis taip pat svarbu, kad savo išlaidas mažintų ir EP nariai.
I believe, however, that in the climate of austerity which the EU is experiencing, it is also important for Members to moderate their spending.
You are an expert in language translation, especially between English and Lithunian. Reply with the only translated text, with no other information.
Translate the following Lithunian text into English: Tai galima pasiekti pirmiausia su mažųjų ir vidutinių įmonių, kurios yra vienos pagrindinių varomųjų jėgų valstybių ekonomikoje, parama.
This can be guaranteed primarily with the support of small and medium-sized businesses, which are one of the main engines within the national economies.
You are an expert in language translation, especially between English and Lithunian. Reply with the only translated text, with no other information.
Translate the following Lithunian text into English: Tai reiškia, kad per trejus ar ketverius metus atsinaujinančioji energija elektros sektoriuje užims anglies ir branduolinės energijos vietą.
This means that in three to four years, renewable energy will have overtaken coal and nuclear power in the electricity sector.
You are an expert in language translation, especially between English and Lithunian. Reply with the only translated text, with no other information.
Translate the following Lithunian text into English: (DE) Pone pirmininke, pone K. Vigeninai, jūs čia kalbėjote kaip pranešėjas, o ne kaip eilinis kalbėtojas.
(DE) Mr President, Mr Vigenin, you have spoken here as the rapporteur and not as an ordinary speaker.
You are an expert in language translation, especially between English and Lithunian. Reply with the only translated text, with no other information.
Translate the following Lithunian text into English: Investicijos į MVĮ reiškia svarbų indėlį į Europos Sąjungoje diegiamas naujoves bei vykdomą tyrimų ir plėtros veiklą.
Investing in SMEs is a means of making a significant contribution to the innovation, research and development activities taking place in the European Union.
You are an expert in language translation, especially between English and Lithunian. Reply with the only translated text, with no other information.
Translate the following Lithunian text into English: Tačiau nesu naivus ir žinau, kad islamo pasaulyje sunku puoselėti šias vertybes.
I am not naïve, however, and I know that in the Islamic world, it is difficult to take these values forward.
You are an expert in language translation, especially between English and Lithunian. Reply with the only translated text, with no other information.

Translate the following Lithunian text into English: Ateities galimybės tapti Europos Sąjungos nare, įskaitant Europos Sąjungos sutarties 49 straipsnį, galėtų būti reformų įgyvendinimo šiose šalyse varomoji jėga.
'A European perspective including Article 49 of the Treaty on European Union' could constitute a driving force for reforms in these countries.
